name: Triple Tier Brownies
ingredients: 1 pkg. fudge brownie mix (13 x 9 pan size)
instructions: Prepare brownie mix according to package directions, used greased 9 x 13 pan.
In a large saucepan combine chips and peanut butter.
Cook over low heat 4-5 minutes or until blended, stirring occasionally.
Chill for 30 minutes or until set before cutting.
